release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: PDS-51: Updates to registry objects no longer overwrite key attributes when not provided by the client. Key attributes include home, lid, status, and versionName.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: PDS-41: Allow filtering by status.
PDS-43: Registry client now supports an expanded set of registry objects. Namely, ExtrinsicObject, Association, Service, RegistryPackage, AuditableEvent, ClassificationScheme, and ClassificationNode.
Cleaned up the documentation and removed the PDF generation feature.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 2.0.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: Added support for PostgreSQL.
Ability to generate database schema from the model classes.
JSON serialization of Enums.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 1.2.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: PDS-14: Support to do package level operations such as delete and update status. In addition, allows for items to be published into a package.
PDS-18: Updated RegistryClient to use RegistryObjects instead of low-level constructs. This will ease integration with outside tools.
PDS-32: Added support for external link operations.
PDS-39: Built in support for replication operations and report on ongoing replication.
Enchanced Auditable Event end point to allow for better filtering. Now supports eventStart, eventEnd, and requestId.
Refactored registry service interface and implementation to consolidate and remove redundant code. Publish and delete of all objects now go through single methods instead of one for each object.
Now throws an exception when looking up object versions of something that does not exist. Previously this returned null which caused problems upstream.

release.description: This release of the Registry Core is a component of the integrated release 1.1.0 of the PDS 2010 System.
release.action: PDS-1: Delete associations when a registry object is removed.
PDS-3: Ability to page through all services.
PDS-7: Mapped Product to ExtrinsicObject to align better with information model for registry. Moved all interfaces that ended in product(s) to extrinsic(s).
PDS-8: Allow a set of Classifications to be associated with a given registry object.
PDS-16: Configuration end point to pass in classification schemes and nodes as one XML file.
PDS-17: Make associations based off their global identifier instead of the LIDVID.
PDS-19: Defined RegistryPackage as an intrinsic object. Acts merely as a collection of registered objects through the use of Associations.
PDS-20: Added ExternalIdentifier support for registered objects.
PDS-22: Include delete operation for Classifications delete.
Refactored model classes from the service classes to allow for the core to be included as a jar dependency.
Set the object type for all intrinsic objects.
